items.name: Barley Blend
items.description: Finely chopped, golden-brown leaf with malty undertones and a smooth, sweet taste. A cheap leaf, favoured by farmers and ploughmen. Effect: Aids digestion after a heavy meal.

consumption_effect.description: Aids digestion after a heavy meal

items.name: Burglar's Blend
items.description: A stringy, rough-cut mix of black and chestnut brown leaves. Its coarse, bonfire aroma makes it an acquired taste. Effect: Keeps one awake in the dead of night.

consumption_effect.description: Keeps one awake in the dead of night

items.name: Crofter's Daughter
items.description: A soft, auburn-hued leaf. Its smooth aroma carries a note of citrus. A homely leaf, beloved of townsfolk. Effect: Makes one feel happy with one's lot.

consumption_effect.description: Makes one feel happy with one's lot

items.name: Dusty Abbot
items.description: An ultra-fine dust (can also be taken as a snuff) of purplish-brown hue. Produces a cool, refined smoke with the odour of rosewood and the taste of cherry. Favoured by the noble classes. Effect: Elicits a state of jovial eloquence.

consumption_effect.description: Elicits a state of jovial eloquence

items.name: Fatty Lumper
items.description: Uncut leaves, crumbled roughly. Tastes sweet and nutty, smells of elderberries. Effect: Brings on a ravenous appetite.

consumption_effect.description: Brings on a ravenous appetite

items.name: Flufftop
items.description: A soft, furry, golden leaf, roughly cut, glistening with fragments of crystalline pollen. Produces a thick, greenish smoke with a heady aroma of spice. Favoured by Grimalkin. Some say this leaf originated in Catland. Effect: Brings on a state of light-hearted whimsy.

consumption_effect.description: Brings on a state of light-hearted whimsy

items.name: Gamgy Weed
items.description: Slivered, semi-dried leaf of brown-green hue. The pungent aroma has an off-putting edge of ammonia, but the smoke is smooth and floral. Effect: Causes a heavy sleepiness.
items.smell: Pungent with edge of ammonia; smoke is smooth and floral

consumption_effect.description: Causes a heavy sleepiness

items.name: The Gibbet's Gift
items.description: Ashen white dust. Produces an exceptionally thin, penetrating smoke that seeps across the ground. The smoke is almost odourless, but tastes strongly of gravy. Effect: Smoking this pipeleaf aids one in following through with unpleasant decisions.

consumption_effect.description: Aids one in following through with unpleasant decisions

items.name: Green Jenny
items.description: Raw, rolled leaves of a variety that will burn undried. The smoke is thin and astringent, but the taste is sublime, with notes of apple and walnut. Effect: Smoking this leaf in excessive quantities causes one's vision to take on a green tinge.
items.taste: Sublime with notes of apple and walnut

consumption_effect.description: Excessive smoking causes vision to take on green tinge

items.name: Lanksbottom Leaf
items.description: Chopped almost to dust, this common pipeleaf is near black in colour and has a robust, chocolate aroma. Grown in the warm valleys of the southern High Wold. The favoured smoke of lower class breggles. Effect: Brings on a state of merry arrogance.

consumption_effect.description: Brings on a state of merry arrogance

items.name: Mogglemoss
items.description: Rich, green curls that produce a smouldering, emerald smoke. The aroma is of springtime, the taste of cheese and onion. Favoured by woodgrues, scrabies, and (rumour has it) the Drune. Effect: Causes an introspective state in which the obscure may become clear.

consumption_effect.description: Causes an introspective state in which the obscure may become clear

items.name: Mummer's Farce
items.description: A finely shredded, oak-brown leaf with fibrous hairs. Favoured by gamblers, its pungent, nutmeg aroma lingers in the taverns of Dreg. Effect: Inspires jollity and hijinks.

consumption_effect.description: Inspires jollity and hijinks

items.name: Old Doby
items.description: Sumptuous, velvety, red-brown leaf with an aroma reminiscent of the woods in autumn. Old Doby is regarded by many as the forefather of all varieties of pipeleaf. A common but well-loved leaf. Effect: Calms the nerves and lightens the spirit.

consumption_effect.description: Calms the nerves and lightens the spirit

items.name: Pedlar Puff
items.description: A rich, densely packed, sticky leaf, lustrous near-black in colour. The smoke is thick and cloying, the aroma like that of summer rain. Effect: Smoking this pipeleaf enhances the determination of foot-travellers whose destination still lies far away.

consumption_effect.description: Enhances determination for foot-travellers with distant destinations

items.name: Shaggy Pony
items.description: A stringy, oat-brown leaf that smells of horse. The smoke is sweet (and also horsey) and tastes of baked tomato. Effect: Aids deep and restful sleep.
items.smell: Horse; smoke is sweet and horsey

consumption_effect.description: Aids deep and restful sleep

items.name: Special Shag
items.description: Rich, moist, finely-cut leaf of dark, reddish-brown hue. The refined aroma carries notes of plum blossom. Bears the Ducal seal of approval. Effect: Enhances good judgement in trying times.

consumption_effect.description: Enhances good judgement in trying times

items.name: Speckled Wyrm
items.description: A blend of greyish, rough-cut leaf with strands of silver. The taste is hoppy; the smoke is woody and is speckled with glittering, silver motes. Effect: Brings about a state of intent concentration.
items.smell: Woody smoke with glittering silver motes

consumption_effect.description: Brings about a state of intent concentration

items.name: Wayside Wisp
items.description: A fine, supple leaf of silvery hue. Produces coils and spirals of violet smoke, smelling of lavender. This rare and refined leaf is said to be cultivated in Fairy. Effect: Smoking it brings on a state of wonder and glee.

consumption_effect.description: Brings on a state of wonder and glee

items.name: Westling's Weed
items.description: Dense, fibrous leaf of copper-red hue. Imported from the distant west. Produces a heavy, dark smoke with the odour of smoked fish. Effect: Inspires dreams of travel and adventure.

consumption_effect.description: Inspires dreams of travel and adventure

items.name: Witch's Shag
items.description: A blend of yellow and purplish leaves, finely cut. The smoke is smooth and fruity. Effect: Inspires a pleasant dizziness.

consumption_effect.description: Inspires a pleasant dizziness
